Hey, I’m Aarham!

I am a third year CS Student @ SFU, expecting to graduate in May 2025. I have a passion for problem solving and interest in building services that cater to the needs of many people. As a developer, I have honed skills in various technologies. Currently, I'm working extensively with Rust and Vue.js as a Application Developer at Modrinth. In my spare time, I have gained development experience with C# and have built programs using ASP.NET Core, WPF, and video games in Unity. Apart from building software, I enjoy classical music, basketball, and poking trees.

Experience

Junior Application Developer | Modrinth

⮞

Built and deployed cross-platform desktop applications to gamers and hobbyists who are passionate about in-game mods. Demonstrated leadership during our migration from Electron.js to Tauri through mentorship and team engagement.

Rust | Vue.js | TypeScript | Git | Selenium| Docker

Peer Tutor | SFU

⮞

Regularly explained computer science concepts and assisted with assignments for first-year students, ranging from fundamental data structures such as arrays, trees, and linked-lists, all the way to principles in Object-Oriented Design in C++.

C++ | Linux | DS & A | OOP
